    • Method Detail

      • readJSONResponse

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer readJSONResponse(java.net.HttpURLConnection con)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Generic Method
        Read data from a source using Bufferedreader. BufferedReader simplifies reading text from a character input stream.
        The BufferReader insert the whole content of the connection inside a string of type StringBuilder.
        The reading process stops at the end of the file.

        Method writeRequest precedes this method.
        Method buildResponseObject precedes this method.

        Note: The connection HTTP in the parameter is already open.

        Parameters:
        con - Connection HTTP from which the stream is read.
        Returns:
        string value of what the contains the Http connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an issue with I.O operations

      • buildResponseObject

        public static Output buildResponseObject(java.lang.StringBuffer response)
        Specific Method
        Build the Output.
        • Create an object of type Gson
        • Insert the response of Actico into Output using the method fromJson

        Method readJSONResponse precedes this method.
        This Method is the last method embedded in ActicoInterface#getResponse.

        Parameters:
        response - string with the content of the JSON response
        Returns:
        the object model Output

      • writeRequest

        public static void writeRequest(java.net.HttpURLConnection con,
                                Request request)
        Specific Method
        Write and send a request.
        • Cast Request into a String
        • Open a connection for writing

        Method launchServer precedes this method.
        Method readJSONResponse precedes this method.

        Note: the HTTP connection is open at his stage of the process

        Parameters:
        con - Http connection in which the request information is sent
        request - request attributes
